thread.title: Great hotel, awesome location, would definitely stay there again!
thread.title_full: Great hotel, awesome location, would definitely stay there again! - Review of Beaugrenelle Saint Charles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Rafael A
title: Great hotel, awesome location, would definitely stay there again!
text:
Positive:
The hotel is great, location is awesome and rooms are super nice and clean, exactly like the photos on the website. Staff was also super nice and polite. I would definitely stay there again on my next visit to Paris and would totally recommend the hotel.
Negative:
The breakfast is extremely limited and basic. I felt like 12 euros was totally overpriced for what was offered. I've had better breakfasts in hostels.
